Jargon Term: confirmed that you were indeed having seizures
Start Keppra 1500 mg twice a day
Start Dilantin 100 mg in morning and at noon, then 150 mg in the evening
Stop Heparin 5,000 unit/mL three times a day 6
Start Metoprolol Tartate 37.5 mg three times a day
